content.prompt: A certain species of dinosaur laid large numbers of eggs, and the hatchlings had high mortality early in life. But if they survived, the young dinosaurs were able to grow at a rapid pace and disperse into the environment in order to thrive. Based on this information and the graph above, which of the following best characterizes this species of dinosaur?

choices.label: The dinosaurs were r-strategists and exhibited a Type I survivorship curve.
The dinosaurs were r-strategists and exhibited a Type III survivorship curve
The dinosaurs were K-strategists and exhibited a Type II survivorship curve.
The dinosaurs were K-strategists and exhibited a Type I survivorship curve.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
